scheduler.menu.schedule.allInOne
Class LocationList

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.Box
                  scheduler.menu.schedule.allInOne.GenList<Location>
                      scheduler.menu.schedule.allInOne.LocationList
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class LocationList
extends GenList<Location>

Represents a checkbox list of the locations in a location database. Note that the locations displayed represent those in the -local- database, not the remotely-global one.

Author:
Eric Liebowitz
See Also:
Serialized Form

Field Detail

ldb

private LocationDB ldb
Location data from whence this list will grab its data to display.

Constructor Detail

LocationList

public LocationList(int axis,
                    LocationDB ldb)
Creates a list of locations. Column headers are "Bldg/Room".

Parameters:
axis - Direction the contents of the box are to go (hor. or vert)
ldb - LocationDb you want backing this list
Method Detail

populate

protected void populate()
Populates the list of locations. For each location, its building and room number are displayed.

Specified by:
populate in class GenList<Location>
